EmailTemplate.description: When a sales rep asks to get assigned to an account they are not owners of.
EmailTemplate.name: Manager Account Owner Change
EmailTemplate.subject: Change Account Owner Instructions - {!Case.Thread_Id}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Please have your manager reassign this account in TOPS as this is not managed within Salesforce.
Please have your manager review the linked documents below:
https://officedepot.gosavo.com/Document/Document.aspx?id=35506612&view=&srlid=35665106&srisprm=False&sritidx=1&srpgidx=0&srpgsz=25
{!Case.Thread_Id}
